comm: nice and full on off, no swing, tapped to mid-on
full again, this is just a shade outside off. Rohit blocks with a straight bat
gentle, non-swinging length ball on off, Rohit seeks to pick it up. Hit high on the bat and spooned over the returning Mitch Marsh at midwicket
banged in short, controlled pull to long leg
short and on middle and leg, Dhawan is cramped for room. He manages to jab it towards square leg
skiddy back of a length ball on middle, Dhawan inches forward and drops it defensively onto the pitch
good length and outside off, only at 129ks, Rohit sits back and secures a single down to third man with soft hands
clipped off the pads towards square leg, hint of inswing. Faulkner dives to his left to stop the ball
this one shapes away wide outside off at 134ks, left alone. Past the tram line
back of a length and slanting away outside off. Dhawan thought of having a nibble at it before pulling out
sliding onto the leg-stump line, brushes the pad on its way to the diving Wade
another leg-stump ball, Dhawan isn't in great form to pick it away for four. He deflects it off the pad/inside edge to Wade
shot! This time he nails it. Full and on middle, Dhawan shows the full face of the bat and crisply drives it gun-barrel straight down the ground
Richardson, who had the floppy hat at the boundary earlier, hits a kicking length outside off. Rohit lets it pass to the keeper
back of a length and outside off, Rohit stands tall and runs a single down to third man, after beating the diving backward point fielder
full and on middle, Dhawan shapes to drive, but the bat twists in his hands. Mis-hit to mid-on
length and angling away outside off, Dhawan jabs it to point
full and swings in a touch on middle and leg, wafty drive to mid-on again
back of a length on middle, punchy drive from Dhawan, but he finds mid-off
full and in the corridor, Rohit is indecisive. He is late to drag his bat away, poked off the face behind point
pitched up on middle at 139ks, Dhawan wants to flick it over square. He skews it over mid-on, off the bottom part of the bat
shortish and curls away now, squares Dhawan. He manages to drop it in front of cover
pitched up and width, Dhawan frees his arms. He crunches it to short cover, where Finch hunts it down. He has a floppy hat on as well
short and straight in line, fended back to Hastings
pitched up on middle, no lateral movement at all. Dhawan strides forward and blocks it back to the bowler
full and aimed at off again, driven straight to mid-on. Rohit did not middle that shot
back of a length and just a shade outside off, punched back to the bowler, who dives to his left and deflects the ball towards the covers

Rohit Sharma gone early at the MCG, after opening 2016 with back-to-back tons! Full and in the corridor outside off, Rohit looked to run it down to third man. Richardson finds the outside edge and Wade snaffles it. Rohit was late to swish his bat away earlier. This time, he has nicked behind for 6
short and on the hips, flicked uppishly to long leg
shorter and outside off, Dhawan stands tall and punches it to the covers
pitched up on middle, driven sweetly but straight to mid-off
dug in outside off, Kohli rides the bounce and plays to backward point
tight fourth-stump line, gently defended back to Hatings
zippy tennis-ball bounce outside off, beats Kohli's attempted cut
length and outside off, Kohli helps it down to third man
short on off, this one hurries onto Dhawan at 141ks. He is perhaps late onto the pull, wafting it back to the bowler
good length and holds its line on middle, dabbed to backward point
banged in, Kohli is tested with another bumpy short ball, quick at 143ks. Kohli swivels and flaps a pull to square leg
overpitched and outside off, Dhawan cracks a drive... hits it straight to mid-off
short and width outside off, Dhawan likes width. He cuts it down to third man
Richardson spears it down leg, Kohli can't glance it away
full ball on off, this one held up a bit more in the pitch, messing with Kohli's drive. Spooned in front of cover
full on off and middle, Kohli brings his wrists into play and flicks it through backward square leg
Richardson hits the deck hard and hammers a short ball on off, Dhawan manages to sneak a single to third man with a bottom-edged pull
Hastings tests Dhawan with a short ball. He does not get hold of the pull again. He top-edges it, Faulkner tracks back from square leg, dives, but the ball spirals over him
back of a length, defended
full and on off, Kohli hangs back and dabs it defensively in front of square
full and outside off, Kohli skips forward, pokey drive in the gap at the covers. Bailey with the floppy putting up the chase
dug in short, Dhawan sits back and cuts it past backward point, to the right of Richardson at third man
lifting short ball outside off, left alone. Dhawan plays out 21 dots out of 26 balls
yorker, Richardson nails the blockhole on middle, dug out to square leg
Richardson goes too full on off now, Kohli twirls his wrists and flicks it handsomely to the right of mid-on
near-yorker length ball, squeezed in front of mid-off
full on off and middle, Kohli does not time this flick well enough but secures three through midwicket
back of a length on middle, Dhawan camps back and defends it back to the bowler
full and in the driving radar, Dhawan hits it to short cover, where Finch move swiftly to his left and stops the ball
pitched up and outside off, Kohli leans forward and caresses a drive, mid-off dives to his left and makes a half save
length and outside off, laced to cover-point, where Bailey fumbles, and gives Dhawan some breathing space at the other end
back of a length and angling away, Kohli drops back and dabs a cut to third man
Dhawan dances out, Faulkner sucks pace off this outside off and has Dhawan dancing to his tune instead. Dabbed towards the point region as Dhawan can't manufacture his own pace
full and heading down leg, loose ball. Kohli glances it fine and brings up 7000 ODI runs, the fastest to reach the landmark
length and outside off, pushed to point on the front foot
short on middle, Dhawan chops it to the off side, adjacent to the pitch. He looks for a quick single. It isn't there
back of a length on middle, punched to the off-side sweeper
full on off, Kohli is forward and across in defence
full ball on off, solidly blocked on the front foot
full on middle, Kohli shuffles across off and clips it in front of square on the leg side
dug in short on middle, Dhawan pulls one down to Faulkner at the square leg boundary
back of a length on middle and leg, Dhawan does not have room to free his arms. Bunted defensively to short midwicket
fullish on off, blocked on the front foot
length ball on off, Dhawan picks it up, whips his wrists, and goes over midwicket
short and banged in, targetting the ribs. Pulled down to long leg
length ball, angled wide of Smith at slip
full and angling away, Kohli dabs it towards backward point now
nicely tossed up on middle, blocked with bat and pad close together
Dhawan stays back and turns a single to square leg
quicker offbreak, Kohli skips back and clips to deep midwicket
guided off the pads to long leg
very full on middle, jabbed past the covers
this one slides on at 90ks, Kohli goes back and flicks behind square
full on middle, blocked to short midwicket
short ball on off, punchily played to short cover
jabbed from outside off to mid-off
Faulkner ventures shorter and pushes the batsman back. Fended
dug in outside off, not much pace there to trouble Dhawan. He rolls his wrists on a pull to S Marsh at deep midwicket
flicked neatly through midwicket
full on off from round the wicket, nurdled behind square for a well-judged single
flat on the pads, whipped through midwicket
Kohli uses his feet and flicks to mid-on, half-save from the fielder at short midwicket
milked down to long-on
tickled off the pads just behind square for one
slides across off, blocked to the leg side on the back foot
Dhawan skips out, meets a full ball, and drives it to mid-off
full and slanting away outside off, Kohli drives nicely on the front foot, but Finch flings to his left at mid-off and takes sheen off the shot
slower ball outside off, Dhawan waits for it to arrive and eases it to deep cover
pitched up and angling away, crisply driven to deep cover
Dhawan charges at Faulkner. The bowler shortens his length, this gets big on Dhawan. He gloves it onto the pitch
back of the hand slower ball at 111ks, Dhawan drags a pull past midwicket
full on middle, Dhawan answers with a dead bat
loopier on middle, blocked on the front foot
pitched up and outside off, front-foot drive past cover. Kohli says no to the second run
Kohli skips out and flicks to long-on
Dhawan now twinkles down, meets the pitch, and secures a single to long-off
heading down the leg side, swept to Hastings at long leg
full and outside off, forward and guided to third man
short and outside off, slapped to point. Maxi is lurking there
bouncer outside off, keeps low, beats the attempted pull
back of a length on middle, punchily played to cover
Maxi dives to his right at backward point and stops this late dab from Dhawan
Boland bangs this lifter down leg

short on the hips, Dhawan does not connect with the pull properly. He gets a bottom edge, and that's enough for a four, fine on the leg side, the first boundary since the 12th over. Just six boundaries overall in 18 overs
rising ball on off, gently pulled behind square. Kohli is keen on the second, but a quick Wade denies that
short ball on middle, punched to point. A brief miscommunication, but no harm for India
whipped off the pads to short midwicket. Another yes-no moment for India
short ball on middle, Dhawan edges another pull to long leg
flicked from outside off to long-on
short and outside off, slapped to Maxi at point
back of a length on off, Kohli manipulates it behind square with the wrists. He sprints back for the second
full and outside off, guided towards backward point. Ticked over for one. Dhawan should do more of this
back of a length and outside off, chopped towards third man on the back foot
back of a length, Kohli now chops it behind to Wade. There was not much width to cut that away
nudged behind point for one more. Good, early call from Kohli
Dhawan angles one to backward point, finds the fielder
short and outside off, Kohli unleashes a cut and sends it to the left of Maxi at point. Whistles away to the boundary
full and aimed at off, whipped towards long-on
short on middle, dabbed in front of cover
back of a length on middle and leg, weakly punched to short midwicket
Dhawan loosens his shackles. He runs down the track, the bowler pitched it short. Flat-bat pull over midwicket
almost dragged on. Full and outside off, Dhawan gets across, does not connect well with a cover-drive. The ball rolls behind
full ball on off, tentatively defended back to the bowler
fractionally short and outside off, flashed in the air... to the left of a diving Maxi at point. Dhawan drops his bat while running. The pair has to settle with two
back of a length, defended on the front foot
short and ample width outside off, Kohli lashes a cut behind point, to the right of Maxi now
back of a length, turned into the vacant midwicket region. Smart placement and better running here
fullish ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
Dhawan comes down, does not meet the pitch, and takes it on the pad
full and outside off, leans forward, meets the pitch, and drives past cover
pushed through on middle and leg, Dhawan goes low and slog-sweeps over midwicket
milked down to long-on now. Dhawan catches up with Kohli
Kohli uses his feet and flicks past midwicket for a 51-ball fifty. That's his third successive fifty in the series. Kohli raises his bat and acknowledges the cheers
Dhawan eases to deep cover and brings up a fifty of his own. Can India kick into next gear?
short and on off, pulled to deep midwicket
good length and around off, poked out to point
full and outside off, helped to third man with a controlled outside edge
Dhawan skips out again, he has a big whoosh and misses. The ball zips through to the keeper. Richardson is quick
Dhawan rocks back and pulls this short ball over midwicket
fuller and outside off, dabbed to backward point
swept from outside off to short fine leg
pushed through, front-foot drive to cover
tossed up on middle, Dhawan goes low and sweeps it over backward square leg. 100 partnership up. Kohli embraces Dhawan who looks more relaxed now
pitched up, skiddy ball, played to long-on
another hurrying ball, nudged behind square on the back foot
bowled round the legs? Drifting onto the leg stump, Kohli shapes to sweep and misses. I guess the ball brushed Wade's pads/boot and knocked off the bails
back-foot punch to deep cover
short, rising ball, Kohli is rushed into a pull. He ends up deflecting it behind square
Dhawan steps away, misses the late cut
short on the pads, Dhawan short-arms it away over backward square leg
Dhawan has nailed this! Fractionally short on off, Dhawan is on the front foot as he pulls to the wide long-on boundary
Dhawan shows his ace a bit early as he dances out, Richardson gets some steep bounce on this short ball, which thuds into the gloves of Wade. Dhawan ignores it
room outside off, cut to third man
slippery full ball on off, angled to third man
chopped from the stumps to the keeper
Dhawan lobs it over Wade for four! Dhawan aims to pull and scoops it over Wade off the toe end. He chases in vain

Hastings bowls Dhawan and lets out a roar! Full and Dhawan shuffles across off. He wants to pick it up and lift it away over square leg. No dice. Hastings nails the leg stump. Hastings has reward for hitting the deck hard and tying down India
bouncer outside off, Rahane rocks his head out of the way
pitched up on middle, Kohli advances and hits to long-on
Rahane now uses his feet and knocks it to long-on
slides on middle, played to square leg
darted short, pulled to long-on
drifting onto the leg stump, helped to long leg with a sweep
darted into the leg stump, hits the pad and rolls behind square
back of a length and outside off, punchy drive to mid-off, another diving save
Hastings pounds the deck again, short and just outside off, chopped to third man
back of a length on off, worked to short midwicket. Bailey is prowling there
Kohli flashes and misses in the corridor. Hastings scoots past the outside edge
dabbed down to third man, Kohli plays closer to the body
full and outside off, Rahane transfers his weight on the front foot and displays a serene drive to mid-off
Kohli dances out and eases a single down the ground
slid on off, Rahane steps out and flicks to midwicket
heading down leg, glanced to fine leg
slapped from outside off to long-on
Rahane jumps out of the crease again, gets too close to the pitch, and clips a single towards square leg
Kohli now flicks it off the pads to deep midwicket
short and outside off, square-cut away
back of a length and outside off, Rahane glides it to third man
short on off, tapped to midwicket
beats mid-on (Smith) to his left! Full on middle, Rahane leans forward and exquisitely drives it down the ground. Smith slams his hands onto the turf
back of a length and outside off, Rahane bottom-edges a cut behind to Wade
short at 141ks, Rahane was late onto the pull. He is socked on the shoulder
Kohli takes a step out and works to square leg
straight in line, turned to midwicket
another leg-side shot. Full on middle, down the track and whipped past midwicket
slides on, Rahane stands tall and punches past cover
Rahane uses his feet and hits this back to Maxi
darted on the leg stump, pulled to long leg with a whirl of the wrists
width outside off, slashed past the covers
angled full on off, Kohli lunges forward and crunches it in the air.... Hits the gap between covers and mid-off
pokey drive to cover, Finch gathers the ball, under-arm flicks it onto the stumps. They pinch a single off the richochet
full ball, pushed down the ground
full and on the stumps, drilled down the ground, Faulkner gets a hand to it, but can't deflect it back onto the stumps, like the way he ran out Rohit in the previous match
shortish on off, defended back to the bowler
flat on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket
Rahane steps out, backs away, and caresses it inside out over the covers. Top, top shot
slides on middle, punched to Richardson at long-on
pitched up and outside off, played back to the bowler
slides on again, guided from outside off to short third man
clipped off the pads to square leg
short and outside off, cut to Maxi at backward point
angled outside off, dabbed to Maxi again
Maxi comes into play again. Full and aimed at off, tapped to backward point with a slight open face
full on off, turned to short midwicket
Kohli uses his feet, the bowler pitches it short. Guided wide of backward point. Kohli and Faulkner share a few words
back of a length, tennis-ball bounce outside off, beats Rahane's late cut
full on off, pushed to midwicket

Kohli dances out and slices this full ball in the air. Marsh, from sweeper cover, was late to pick up the ball, with the sun squinting into his eyes. He belatedly sprints in, but the ball lands in front of him
what.a.shot! Kohli runs down the track and launches it high and over long-on, first six of the match in the 36th over
short on off, pulled behind square
full on off, flicked behind square. Kohli races across for the second
full and nips in, whistles past the outside edge as Rahane sought to run down to third man
back of a length, jabbed to the left of short midwicket
dug in short, Rahane attacks it and pulls it over mid-on who is in the circle. One bounce four
slippery bouncing ball outside off, Rahane bends his back but can't upper-cut it away
slower ball at 115ks from Faulkner, he fools Rahane, beats the flick and hits the pad
back of the hand slower ball again, diverted behind to the keeper
length ball on off, pushed to the left of short midwicket
full on the stumps, Rahane can't connect with the flick again
glanced off the pads behind square
back of a length, Rahane leans back and late-cuts it to short third man
just wide of Bailey at short midwicket. Full and on middle, chipped in the air to the right of Bailey who was diving to his right
low full toss, drilled to long-on
Richardson comes back and digs it short and outside off as Kohli steps out. Guided to backward point
full on off, picked away to short midwicket, straight to Bailey this time
length and outside off, slotted through the covers
lifting ball, close to off. Rahane hops and angles it to short third man
turned from off through backward square leg
chopped from the off stump to short third man
shorter as Boland is wary of Kohli stepping out, dabbed to the off side
Rahane advances, meets a full ball, and drives it straight down the ground. Kohli pats him on the helmet
back of a length, chopped to the off side for one
Kohli keeps jumping down the track, he has to deal with another short ball. Jabbed into the point area
short and on the hips, deflected square on the leg side
pitched up on off, Kohli targets the leg side and ends up getting a soft leading edge that rolls to mid-off
Kohli skips out and lashes it to Maxi at deep cover. Kohli is keen to take on Maxi's arm. Rahane rightly says no
Rahane comes down, gets a dipping full toss, and bunts it to long-on
back of a length, hits the thigh, as Kohli misses the flick
short on off, Rahane firmly pulls it behind square. He controlled it superbly to split the two fielders in the deep
Rahane turns his head, searching for the ball. Oh, where is it? He shapes for a drive, but drops it in front of his toes off an inside edge
Kohli moves away outside leg, the bowler chases him with a near yorker, jabbed to short midwicket
back of a length on off, turned to midwicket on the front foot
Rahane is on the walk as he misses the flick
down the track and hoicked behind square
Kohli uses his feet and whips squarer, to deep midwicket
back of a length, glanced to long leg
Kohli jumps out of the crease again, whipped over backward square. The throw from the deep is a little rocket
Rahane dances out, Richardson tricks him with a slower ball, sliced off a thick edge, just dies in front of Boland. He picks up on the half-volley at short third man
leg-stump ball, helped to long leg with a pull
crackling hit! Pitched further up on off, Kohli snaps his wrists and shovels over midwicket. Very, very, wristy
back of a length on off, Kohli picks it away behind square. Kohli leaps, pumps his fist! He brings up his 24th ODI century, gets a hug from Rahane
Richardson drifts a slower ball down leg, wide. Wade is beaten
back of a length, clipped to midwicket
full and outside off, nice flowy drive to short cover, who dives to his right, and deflects the ball to mid-off
Rahane uses his feet and skies one in front of long-on off a leading edge
whipped through backward square leg for one
full ball, Rahane can't pick it up over midwicket, takes it on the thigh pad as the ball rolls on the pitch. Kohli scampers across for a single
down the track and short-armed away over midwicket
full and straight, twirled to long-on
#MCG is so big, but Kohli clears the boundary again! He charges down the track, manufactures a full ball, and slugs it over cow corner. India need more blows
slower short ball on middle, paddled to long leg as Rahane gets his fifty. He punches gloves with Kohli

#MCG is so big, Rahane can't clear the fielder. He jumps out, Hastings bangs it short. Rahane drags a pull, Smith runs to his right from long-on, catches it at the edge of the boundary. He loses his balance but tosses the ball over to the man running from deep midwicket (Maxi). We saw a similar catch in the Big Bash Sydney derby yesterday. Silk and Botha were at the tag-team work yesterday
Kohli steps out, Hastings pitches it short. Quietly blocked back to the bowler
slower ball at 118ks, inside edged behind square
Kohli skips down the track and pulls it away towards long-on. Smith slides in vain now
again, he uses his feet. Laced it to Bailey at short cover. Australia's fielding has been spot on today too
dropped short and outside off, Dhoni pulls hard to deep midwicket
off-wide wide, yorker goes too wide
yorker outside off, Faulkner succeeds in hitting the blockhole, squeezed out to extra cover
Dhoni tees off! A bit short, slower back of the hand ball, hoicked flat and hard over midwicket
Faulkner loses his cool. Hurls another off-side wide
low full toss outside off, Dhoni lays into it and smears it past extra cover
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to Bailey at extra cover
Faulkner digs short as Kohli steps out. Weakly pulled to long-on
low full toss on off, creamed to Bailey at extra cover

Kohli steps out and hits it straight into the lap of extra cover. Hastings rolls his fingers across this slower one outside off, 120ks, Kohli slaps it to Bailey. Looked like a leg-breakish slower one. Kohli, who can't manufacture his own pace, is out for a run-a-ball 117
back of a length on off, worked to short midwicket on the back foot
bumper on the leg stump, zings through to the keeper. The debutant ducks his head out of the way
another short one, Gurkeerat top-edges a pull over midwicket
another short ball, but not short enough. Helped to fine leg
short and outside off, cut away behind point. MS is back on strike
back of a length, slogged to long-on
shortish and on the hips, Gurkeerat nails a pull behind square

Gurkeerat undone by the slower ball. This is a Faulkner special, comes from the back of the hand, Gurkeerat does not spot it. He is early into the slog and drags it back onto the leg stump off a thick inside edge. Two slower balls. Two wickets in two overs
low full toss outside off, driven to deep cover. The pair run hard for the second
pushed full and outside off, driven to mid-off
low full toss outside off, eased to deep cover
hurled pretty full and outside off from wide of the crease, Dhoni dances out. Swings and misses
back of a length legcutter outside off, Dhoni picks it up and lifts it over backward square leg
Hastings errs is length, this low full toss is smashed over long-on

four, six, and out! Dhoni spanks it, Maxi takes it, he feels the heat. Wrings his hands. Dhoni danced out again, Hastings banged it onto the middle of the pitch at 140ks. Pulled to deep midwicket, where Maxi hangs onto the catch
low full toss outside off, cracked to deep cover
slash and a miss outside off, wide called. I suspect that was the slower one. Wade fumbles
full on off, slower at 116ks, weak drive back to Faulkner
another slower ball, this one at 111ks, down the track and slogged to long-on
slower full ball, Rishi goes deep in the crease, slog-sweeping over to Smith at long-on
pitched up and outside off, drilled to deep cover. Richardson keeps it to just one
slower one again, slanted across off, Rishi goes low, slogs and fails to connect
Faulkner closes the innings with his assortment of slower balls. Rishi swings wildly, but can't lay bat on it
slants a length ball across Marsh, watched through to Dhoni
shapes back in, nice and full around off, he plays a firm drive to mid-off
in the corridor of uncertainty, the ball was angling away, Marsh was in two minds, in the end just withdrew his bat at the last second, zips through to Dhoni. Good start this
full and across Marsh, this one goes straight on, left alone
width on offer and that has been crashed away into the point boundary. No one moved
tight line this time, back of length on middle, hint of nip away, Marsh dabs it with soft hands to the off side
full and angled across, Finch throws his bat at it, gets a thick edge that just falls short of third man
nips away from the good length area outside off, left alone
good delivery, full, shapes away in the air, Marsh is drawn forward as he drives, gets a thick inside edge to square leg
movement in the air but it was sliding down leg, easy call for the umpire. Indians bowled 19 extras in the last game. That's the first today
length ball angling away, left alone this time
crunching cover drive. Hit me written all over that half-volley. Full, not much movement and all Finch had to do was simply extend his arms and lend direction, which he did. Super shot
back of length delivery around off stump, left alone
moves away from off stump, squeezed towards cover point
good delivery, length ball, closer to the stumps, Marsh hops back and plays it with soft hands
looks to crash it through cover, ends up slicing it behind point towards third man
stands tall and punches it between the two cover fielders, good chase by Rahane but a weak throw. Once again a back of length delivery, good bat flow from Finch as he came down on it
turned towards mid-on this time, Marsh was hurried for pace on that occasion
beautiful flow of the bat once again. Pitched up, not much movement, Marsh plants his front foot forward and essays a classic cover drive past the diving Virat Kohli at wide mid-off
floats it full and across Finch, left alone
hops back and plays the Natraja shot, gets it into the gap at deep backward square leg
excellent stop by Jadeja at backward point, it was crunched but he threw himself to his left to stop that
gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg, lucky
good delivery this time, more effort into the delivery, lands it ahead of good length around off, left alone

wow! simply, wow. Half volley outside off, simply leans into the drive and eases it into the gap at cover. Sourav Ganguly would have been proud of that stroke. Nice high elbow as ball met bat, enough power. Once he found the gap, there was no stopping that
another half volley outside off, this one's hit hard to Rohit at cover. Finch will be kicking himself, a boundary missed.
nips away from outside off, Finch watches it through to Dhoni. He was flirting with the wide line, umpire thinks it was wide enough
angled it full on middle from wide of the crease, tucked to short midwicket for a quick single
sliding into the pads, easy pickings, flicked into the gap at square leg, they're back for the third quite easily, can be tough to throw on the turn here. The throw from Rohit had no power whatsoever
that's closer to the stumps, just a touch around off, held its line, left alone
back of length delivery on off, tapped to short cover
punched to Rohit at cover, no boundary of the over. Better one for India
gentle half volley on the pads, superbly flicked away, long boundary there at deep midwicket, they missed an opportunity to get back for the fourth. Poor bowling
short, wide and four! Sitting up nicely for Finch to use the width and put that away into the gap behind point. Easy pickings at any level of cricket really
gentle full toss this time on off, Finch says 'thank you very much'. Leans forward, goes through the line and beats cover. No chance of stopping that
straight in and straight out. Gurkeerat puts down a sitter at mid-off. It was right in the slot to drive, he hit it hard, he looked like grabbing that, popped out.
back of length delivery on off, left alone
excellent stop by Rohit, throwing himself to his right, deflected to Gurkeerat at mid-off. Saved a certain boundary
gentle tap to mid-off as they scamper through for a quick single. Umesh was caught napping at mid-on, shouldn't have been a run
good ball, angled in on off from wide of the crease at length, left alone
hits the deck hard, extra bounce, hurries onto Finch's bat as he looks to defend off the back foot
back of length delivery on middle, tucked wide of square leg
short ball at 137 kph, enough time for Marsh to swivel and pull that one behind square. Picked the bones out of that one. Rolled his wrists to keep it down, raced away into the boundary
nips away from length area outside off, left alone

a wicket finally. The outside edge has been found courtesy some late movement. Good length, drew him forward, Finch went for the drive, but the foot was nowhere to the pitch of the ball, gets a thin edge which MS accepts gleefully. The manner in which he threw the ball up after pouching that had relief written all over it. He doesn't generally get very animated after taking a catch, he was this time.
this one is directed down leg side, some work for the umpire
too straight this time, tucked away wide of midwicket, off the mark with two easy runs
full on middle, driven to mid-on
late movement again, full on middle, Smith is slightly squared up as he defends it to mid-on
punched to point where Jadeja dives to his right to save a certain boundary, they get through for the single though
shapes away from outside off, left alone
back of length delivery on off, defended to the off side
punched through the line, straight to Shikhar D at cover point
another punch, another stop by Shikhar
short ball, Smith manages to get enough bat on it as he fetches the pull from outside off, beats the gap between midwicket and mid-on

not all that short this time, but another pull that has split the gap on the on side. Went like a rocket. Only a batsman in the form of his life can think of playing that stroke. That Smith is in the form of his life would be an understatement
prods forward half-heartedly, gets an inside edge onto the pad
beaten on the drive, played outside the line, doesn't carry to Dhoni
beaten for pace, thuds into the thigh pad, rolls to the on side as they steal a bye
full and swinging in on middle and off, Smith gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket
peach of a delivery. Lands it a touch ahead of the length area on off, this one nips away just a touch, Smith is beaten as he looks to hit through the line
beats the diving Jadeja at backward point. Right line, but wrong length. Too short, he unfurls his wrists superbly to beat the infield
full on off, carefully defended to the off side
bowls a cutter to start off, short around off, kept a little low, Marsh is beaten on the pull
nice and full on off, driven to mid-off. Kohli effects a direct hit at the bowler's end but Smith's bat is well inside the crease. Third umpire was called for a mere formality
tight line, just in and around the off stump, he gets forward and plays it with soft hands
good chance of pace, well disguised, Marsh shaped to drive but checked his shot at the last moment, defended to the cover fielder
width on offer this time, squeezed away behind point, Sran covers good ground from third man, dishes in a dive to pull that back in
once again eased behind point towards Sran, excellent running between the wickets. Not a bad first over from Rishi D
just short of Rahane at midwicket. Slice of luck for Smith. Looked to flick that past the fielder, didn't get enough bat on that. Few words exchanged between Smith and Umesh
hurried for pace, still manages to awkwardly whip that towards square leg
excellent punch again, width on offer, eased into the gap at cover point, third man had to run in to stop that
width on offer, eased towards third man where Sran runs around, does all the hard work but can't time his dive, parries the ball further but recovers well enough to save a run
pulled handsomely in front of square this time, but there is protection in the deep
better length, a touch fuller and just around off, carefully defended off the back foot
slow leg cutter on off, pushed to deep cover
floats it full and across Marsh, angling away, left alone
tight line on middle, pushed to mid-on. Not much swing but he's been accurate largely
the slower one is bowled full and wide this time, Marsh goes after that one, slices it over the infield, deep cover comes around to stop that
nice drive down to Kohli at long-off
full ball on middle, eased down the ground to mid-on
tossed up on middle, played to long on
eased wide of cover
spins back in from outside off, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
played to midwicket this time. Shouts of 'badiya' from MSD
half-stop by Rahane at midwicket gives them the single
too short this time, cut away into the gap. Cry of anguish from Dhoni this time. Got into position early and executed that cut shot to perfection
slower and fuller on off, played back to the bowler
authoritative drive, but a diving Rohit took the pace off the ball, it deflected towards mid-off
that will definitely frustrate Dhoni, who was standing up to the stumps. Drifting down leg, tickled easily into the fine leg boundary
defended back down the pitch
pushed to short cover again
slower and fuller, eased to deep cover
tossed up on off, pushed back to the bowler
gets forward and pats it with soft hands
tossed up on off, gets to the pitch and crashes that into the cover boundary. Rohit dived across but it was hit really hard
steps out and plays it back to the bowler
turns back in, tucked to short fine to bring the 100 up. India were 34 behind at the same point
gets forward and smothers the spin
angles it full on middle from wide of the crease, pushed to mid-on
driven straight to Rahane at cover, accurate stuff
excellent stop by Jadeja at point again, timed well once again by Smith
bowls it full on middle, Rishi puts his hand out to stop that firm drive back down the ground
slower one on off stump, eased into the gap at cover where Ishant misfields
shows the full face of the bat and eases it down to long on
steps out and turns the low full toss into the midwicket region
gets forward and eases it with soft hands to cover
steps out but doesn't get underneath it, squeezed back to the bowler
slow turn from off, cuts to point
gets a thick edge that flies behind point, Jadeja dives across and pulls one back in
steps out and whips it to midwicket
tossed up on middle, driven impressively, Kohli throws himself to his right at short cover and makes a smart save
fired on middle, whipped to long on
drifting into the pads, neat little glance to long leg
another non-turning ball, this is flicked past midwicket
Jadeja strikes in his first over. India find a way past Smith. Jadeja held this one back, gets some turn as well. The outside edge is grazed and Rahane goes low at first slip to pouch it safely
looped up on middle, front-foot drive to long-off
steps out and turns it to square leg, a direct hit at the bowler's end from Jadeja and Bailey would have been struggling. In fact gone
dabbed with soft hands to the off side
steps out and turns it to long on
nicely tossed up outside off, driven firmly to wide long-off
makes room and eases that one to deep cover
steps out and whips it wide of midwicket
chips down the track and hits it down the ground over mid-on, safe shot given the fielder was in
sliding into middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicket
turned with the spin to midwicket
fires it into the stumps, Marsh stays inside the crease and defends it down the pitch
turned wide of Kohli at mid-on for a quick single
good stop off his own bowling, it was a firm drive
chops one towards backward point
full outside off, squeezed into the gap behind point, back for the second to get to a fifty. Soaks in the applause of the crowd, but knows the job is just half done. 12th fifty for him
beaten as he looks to ease that behind point, this one was too full, cramped for room
slower and fuller on off, mistimes that one back past the bowler
pushed firmly to mid-off

too short, sitting up nicely for him to play the pull, Dhawan comes around, does all the hard work and then falls over, in trying to push it back in, he manages to push it into the boundary instead. Surely the crowd behind him will keep buzzing in his ears. Can be massively embarrassing
pushed to Rohit at cover
spins back in, looks to whip that one, hit on the thigh pad
this time, he manages to get it into the gap at midwicket
drifts in and spins away, tapped back to the bowler
driven with the spin to long off
quicker one on middle from wide of the crease, played back to the bowler
pierces the gap between cover and mid-off. Not all that bad a delivery but he simply put the front foot forward and hit through the line. Perfect balance, super timing
sliding down leg, tickles the pad as Dhoni stops that down leg. Stifled appeal, but more out of hope than anything else
tucked down to fine leg, Umesh was quick to get off the blocks
full on middle, turned to mid-on
crunching cover drive. Juicy half volley this time, leans forward and crunches that into the gap. Second boundary of the over. What flow
outstanding stop by Jadeja at point again. Would have saved at least 10 runs on the field today, yet India find themselves well behind in the piece
pushed to cover
turns away, eased wide of cover for an easy single
round-armish this time, lands it on middle, turned to midwicket
hurries onto him, defended
sliding down leg, tickled towards the fine leg region, easily done
tucked to square leg
swept with the spin to deep backward square
played with soft hands to short midwicket, quick single taken again
hit to mid-on, they get across for a risky single
steps out and eases it with the spin to long off
steps out, looks to turn it with the spin, hit straight to Kohli
tossed up nicely, bit of spin on that one, driven inside-out to long off

beautifully bowled. Ball drifts back in, rips off the surface, turns square, ball zips past Bailey's half-hearted prod, his back foot was in the air as Dhoni collected it cleanly and whipped the bails off in a split second. He made it look so easy. His back foot was on the line. That will definitely even the scales once again. Dhoni knew immediately that it was out. He didn't need confirmation from the third umpire. The giant screen flashes 'OUT' and there's a roar from the Indian contingent.
gets forward and defends
beats the outside edge this time, square turn for Jadeja again. Dhoni whips the bails off again. He's on fire. This time, the back foot was inside the crease
pushed to Kohli at cover
pushed through quicker, gets some fizz again from middle, Maxi gets back and pushes it back with a straight bat
eases it with the spin to long-off, gets off the mark
played back to the bowler
pitched up outside off, driven well but Kohli throws himself to his left to stop that
floats it full on middle and off, doesn't get enough timing but there's still enough to squeeze that past midwicket
chops it behind point for an easy single
full and sliding across the batsman, left alone
driven well, Ishant manages to stop that on his followthrough, nearly deflected it back onto the stumps at the bowler's end
doesn't take long for him to unfurl the reverse sweep. Hit fiercely over point. Quick change of grip and boom!
played to midwicket, this one was pushed through quicker on middle again
makes room and punches it to Kohli at cover
round-arm action again, this one's sliding down leg, excellent take by Dhoni
makes room and chips it inside-out over extra cover, lot of work for the boundary rider
gets back and defends it to cover this time
sharp turn again from off, bunted behind point for an easy single
angling into middle and leg, flicked behind square to deep fine leg
driven firmly but can't pierce cover, straight to Kohli who has a glare at Maxwell at the non-striker's end
excellent square drive, straight to Rohit in the deep
short on middle and leg, pulled away into the gap, Umesh does well to come around from deep fine again
short and wide outside off, punched to deep point

huge roar from Ishant, and that tells you how much it means to him! Coming back to the delivery, it was a length ball that was angling across, good seam position, the ball held its line, Marsh nibbled at that one without any conviction, got a thin edge, straightforward catch for MS Dhoni. India back into this big time
length ball on off, punched to deep cover
gets back into the crease and bunts it to the off side, loud call of no as soon as he hit it
gets to the pitch and drives that one to deep cover, off the mark
good clean strike down the ground. Nice juicy half volley on off, Marsh shows the full face of the bat and lofts him nice and clean, one bounce into the long-on boundary
bunts it down to third man, sensible stuff
beautifully struck down the ground. Poor ball and that has been easily hit back past the mid-on fielder. Lovely timing. Straight bat down to generate the power and timing
improvisation at its best. Short ball on middle, Maxwell arches back and directs it over Dhoni's head. You can't seat a fielder for that stroke
stands tall and punches it to mid-off
plays that down to Sran at third man, quickly off the blocks on that occasion
gets half-forward and bunts it to point
extra bounce this time, hits him high on the right thigh, and they take a leg-bye. A direct hit from Jadeja at the bowler's end would have been interesting
angled into middle and leg, tucked to fine leg
back of length delivery on off, punched to Kohli at cover
forced off the back foot to deep point
closer to the stumps this time, length ball, played back to the bowler
looks to play a pull off the front foot, toe ends it to mid on
that's what annoys Dhoni the most about Umesh. Short and angling down leg, he helps it on its way into the fine leg boundary. Long hop that deserved to be put away
another poor ball. Result the same. Down leg side, tickled into the fine leg boundary. Umesh quickly looks away even as a helpless Dhoni gestures towards him
sliding into middle, looks to tuck it past square leg, misses
full on off from wide of the crease, nips away a touch, Maxwell's squared up as he defends
plays a half-pull down to Dhawan at fine leg, was cramped for room but went through with the stroke
runs it down to third man
angles it full once again, touch of movement as well, played back down the pitch
flays that one to deep cover, excellent running between the wickets
hit firmly to Shikhar at mid-off
closer to the stumps this time, length ball, played back down the pitch with soft hands
appeal for lbw, Maxi is struck on the pad as he looks to run it down to third man, was perhaps struck outside the line
length ball on off, pushed to cover
appeal for lbw as the ball tails back in to hit him on leg. Mitch Marsh was rushed into that attempted flick, umpire reckons it was sliding down. Good call

shows the full face of the bat and plays it down to Ishant, who makes a mess of that at mid-on, what was meant to be a dot ball is two instead. He took his eyes off the ball. Very, very poor. Kohli is livid and he has every right to be.

steps out and crunches that wide of mid-off, Umesh gives it chase, turns around and fires a throw towards Dhoni's end. Mitch Marsh was strolling back casually as the stumps are broken down by the Indian captain, who didn't give any hint of rushing in to take the throw at all. Within the bat of an eye lid, the next thing Mitch Marsh knew was the stumps were broken and he was a couple of inches short. How good has Dhoni been with the gloves today?
angled down leg, turned it down to square leg, easy ball to get off the mark
pulled towards Gurkeerat at deep midwicket
tails back in slightly from off stump, carefully defended to the on side
nips back in from the length area on off, defended to the off side
tapped towards point with soft hands
pushes him onto the back foot by digging one short on off, dropped towards cover with soft hands for a quick single
wrong line, pulled away but straight to deep midwicket
good line once again, in and around off, pats it towards Jadeja at point and scoots across for a single, brilliant effort to fire a direct hit at the non-striker's end
too full this time, driven nicely towards deep cover
angles it ahead of good length on off from wide of the crease, defended to midwicket, he was overbalanced as he made contact
accurate stuff, lands it on off, played back down the pitch
angles a length ball on middle and leg, thuds into the thigh pad as he looks to work it past square leg
looks to step out and slap that over the off side, cramped for room, beaten
gets a thick edge down to Ishant at third man, big cheer from the crowd as he fields it. Ishant waves back to the crowd
nearly chopped back onto the stumps, Dhoni runs in and then uses his football skills to kick it onto the stumps at the striker's end, misses but Maxwell may have been in
pulled but straight to Gurkeerat at deep midwicket
mistimes the pull to Rohit at mid-on

short ball angling away, Wade looks to fetch the pull from outside off, only manages to top edge the pull, Dhawan comes running in from mid-on, settles underneath it and completes a simple catch. Wade didn't look comfortable at all. Was overbalanced too, and the pressure has consumed him when all he had to do was bunt one and give strike to Maxwell. The roar in the Indian camp is back.
angles one down to third man, excellent work by Rishi Dhawan to keep it down to a single
nice and full around off, shows the full face and plays it with soft hands
nearly chopped it back onto the stumps. Dhoni does superbly to move to his left, dive and keep that down to a single. On another night, he would have been walking back to the pavillion
gets an inside edge as he prods outside the line, the point fielder Jadeja comes running in quickly to cut that off
tucked away towards midwicket
short ball on off, he clears the front leg and slaps that over cover, couple of bounces into the boundary. Sitting up nicely because there was no pace on it. He will feast on those all day
slower one on middle and leg, nurdled into the gap at midwicket, excellent running there, just got it in between the two fielders there
appeal for caught behind. Maxwell backed away to go over point, the swing seemed to have missed the outside edge, or did it? Faint deviation on snicko
slower delivery down leg, Maxwell avoids it at the last moment, right call in the end

how much power does he generate! Backs away once again, the short ball was coming in, but backed himself to slap that over the infield and managed to get it all the way over the boundary. So what if the square boundaries are huge? He can still muscle them
Jadeja has single-handedly saved two runs at least, clubs the pull, he throws himself to his left to stop that and then recover quickly to fire a rocket throw
slower one on middle, plyed back down the pitch
length ball on off, bunted to cover
turned away off his pad towards square leg
punched to Rohit at point
fetches the whip from outside off, straight to Ishant at square leg
length ball on off, hustled for pace, he hops back and taps it back down the pitch
shapes to pull, ball kept low and hurried on to hit him on the right thigh. Looks to scamper through but Umesh gets across quickly
into the pads, tucked to midwicket for an easy single
fired into middle, backs away and drives it to long-off
misfield at cover by Rishi, Jadeja hares across to keep it down to a single
backs away to cut, cramped for room, still gets some bat on it, rolls to point
pushed through quicker on middle, squeezed back down the pitch
eased wide of the bowler to long-on
superb delivery. Lands it at length on off, the ball cuts back in sharply, Faulkner pushes outside the line and is cut into half, just goes over the stumps. Cracking stuff
hit back down the ground to mid-off, went hard at it, only managed to toe end it
full on middle, turned away to midwicket, Faulkner called for two, but Gurkeerat was in quickly, fired the throw
clears the front leg and tonks one over long-off. Cross-court fore hand, anybody? He sure can try that at the Rod Laver Arena tomorrow.
too full on the pads, gets across and works it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
high full toss outside off, he backs away and slaps it over cover, didn't get hold of it but still managed to clear the in-field quite astonishingly. Free hit time
excellent stop by Kohli at cover, saved three there.
backs away to hit over cover, changes his mind and taps it back to the bowler
steps out and works it towards square leg, excellent running, Umesh caught napping
punched wide of cover
turns away, he opens the face of the bat and gets it down to deep cover
played with the spin to Kohli at cover
fired into middle and leg, worked towards square leg, Shikhar is alert to the possibility of the second
floats it full on off, driven to long-off
tip and run, like well all do at street cricket. Plays it with soft hands towards Gurkeerat at cover
backs away to slap that over cover, no room to work with, beaten. Excellent change of pace from Ishant, it was the leg-cutter

slower one again on middle and leg, turned to Umesh at square leg, Maxwell was miles outside the crease, not sure why Umesh didn't throw. There was no one backing up alright, but he should have taken the chance and fired the throw
tucked round the corner towards fine leg
shows the full face of the bat and eases it down to long on
draws an outside edge that races away past short third man. No slip, no one at 45, the pace on the ball was enough
worked across the line to long on
steps out and chips it inside-out into the cover boundary. They had the fielder in the deep for a reverse sweep, this time he got to the pitch and placed it superbly into the gap
steps out, Jadeja fires it into middle and leg, deflects off the pad to the off side, Jadeja got to it quickly and fired a throw at the bowler's end. Direct hit and Faulkner was struggling
gets away this time, the reverse sweep finds Ishant at short third man
sliding into middle, worked to mid-on
buffet bowling, as Geoff Boycott would say. Short and angling down leg, tickled into the fine leg boundary. Pressure's off.
worked across the line towards square leg
can't pierce the gap on the off side, straight to Kohli at cover
steps out and eases it into the gap at square third man, back easily for the second run. Just backed away, made room and chopped it nicely
crunched but straight to Rohit at cover this time
gets a thick inside edge but the long-on fielder had to come in a long way, back for the second without a fuss
slices it wide of point, didn't get to the pitch of the ball as he looked to go over cover
drifts in and spins away, played back to the bowler
fired into middle, dabbed back down the pitch
excellent stop by Shikhar at deep square, it was a fierce sweep shot, covered ground, dived to cover the line
deflects off the pad, but there is short fine leg
low full toss outside off, squeezed to cover and they scamper through for a single. That's the end of Jadeja's spell. Quite brilliant
backs away to slap it over the infield, hits it well, one bounce to Shikhar at mid-off, doesn't take the run despite one being easily available

he's hit that 15 rows back into the long boundary at long-on. Umesh floats it full on middle and leg, Maxwell backs away and swings cleanly down the ground. What elevation, pinged the middle of the bat
short, wide and he cracks that up and over backward point, huge gap there, deep cover fielder did a 200-metre sprint but couldn't get anywhere near the ball. Maxi one hit away from a century

looks for the glory hit, the length ball gets a little big on him, can't get any power behind that attempted slap over cover, Dhawan, running back from mid-off, keeps his eye on the ball and takes it well. It was swirling in the air but he kept his composure. Has come a little too late for India. Maxwell walks off to a huge round of applause. What a knock!
dabbed wide of point for an easy run as Australia take an unassailable lead in the five-match series
